amendment.description: Amendment instructs the ONDCP to develop a strategy to combat border tunnels for drug trafficking and to recommend to Congress a criminal penalty for digging or using border tunnels for such acts.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 109-387 to instruct the ONDCP to develop a strategy to combat border tunnels for drug trafficking and to recommend to Congress a criminal penalty for digging or using border tunnels for such acts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Filner amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
